name: dotsimus
description: Automatic moderation of toxic chat messages.

scripts.start: pm2 flush; pm2 start src/index.js --log logs.log --log-date-format 'MM-DD HH:mm' --watch --watch-delay 10000 --restart-delay 10000; pm2 logs
scripts.startwor: pm2 flush; pm2 start src/index.js --watch --watch-delay 10000 --restart-delay 10000; pm2 logs

author: Mindaugas Jasiulis
